mapper.select: SELECT LEFT(ATTENDANCE_YM,4) AS ATTENDANCE_YEAR, RIGHT(ATTENDANCE_YM,2) AS ATTENDANCE_MONTH FROM M_ATTENDANCE_YM WHERE DEL_FLG=0;

SELECT LEFT(CALENDAR_DATE,7) AS ATT_MONTH, COUNT(LEFT(CALENDAR_DATE,7)) AS DAY_COUNT FROM M_CALENDAR WHERE HOLIDAY_FLG = 0 AND DEL_FLG = 0
GROUP BY LEFT(CALENDAR_DATE,7);

SELECT LEFT(t1.CALENDAR_DATE,7) AS ATT_MONTH, COUNT(LEFT(t1.CALENDAR_DATE,7)) AS DAY_COUNT, COUNT(t2.STATUS_ID != '004') AS WORKDAY_COUNT, COUNT(t2.STATUS_ID = '004') AS ABSENCEDAY_COUNT, SUM(t2.ABSENCE_HOURS) AS ABSENCE_HOURS, SUM(t2.WORKING_HOURS) AS WORKING_HOURS, SUM(t2.OVERTIME_HOURS) AS OVERTIME_HOURS FROM M_CALENDAR t1 LEFT JOIN T_ATTENDANCE t2 ON t1.CALENDAR_DATE = t2.ATTENDANCE_DATE WHERE t1.DEL_FLG = 0 AND t1.HOLIDAY_FLG = 0 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM t1.CALENDAR_DATE) = #{selectedYear} GROUP BY LEFT(t1.CALENDAR_DATE,7);
